amendment.description: To clarify that communities that successfully appeal flood elevation determinations based on errors by the Federal Emergency Management Agency through the Scientific Resolution Panel are eligible for reimbursements for expenses incurred in such appeals.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2705 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2705 proposed by Senator King.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2705 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2705 proposed by Senator King.
